oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Bushman drum, and dancing-rattles. Mode of preparation of the latter, by the women. By /han=kasso, (L VIII.-1. 6127-6137). The springbok's ear dancing rattles are made from dried springbok's ear skin with berries sewn inside.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The preparation of the springbok's ears
